description: This file defines an interface IAppManager for mocking purposes in testing, providing method signatures for managing applications such as preload, launch, close, terminate, and property management within the WPEFramework environment.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: A mock interface for application management used in testing scenarios, extending Core::IUnknown and providing methods for app lifecycle operations and property management.

classes.name: IAppManager::INotification
classes.description: A placeholder notification interface with callback methods for app installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: PreloadApp
methods.description: Preloads an application given its ID and launch arguments, returning a status code.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an application with a specified intent and launch arguments.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes the application identified by appId.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates the running application identified by appId.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves a list (as a JSON string) of currently loaded applications.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property key-value pair for a specified application.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified property key for an application.

methods.name: SendIntent
methods.description: Sends an intent to the specified application.

ctags.name: IAppManager
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IAppManager : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
